name: Test Drive: Ferrari Legends
summary: Race some of the sexiest cars ever made in this Ferrari-licensed entry in the famed Test Drive racing franchise. Test Drive: Ferrari Racing Legends brings over 70 years of the world's most recognizable performance cars to gamers. Developed by world-class developer Slightly Mad Studios, Ferrari Racing Legends explores the legacy of Ferrari Racing. It recreates Ferrari's most beloved and coveted performance racers, from today's latest models to the legendary vehicles that have dominated racing history.
